summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5997 for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 55 and 56, Denny & Hoyt's Addition, being the alley between West Cremona Street and West Bertona Street, from 3rd Avenue West to West Nickerson Street; and certain other alleys, streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80339, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
